project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to introduce a set of comprehensive measures that will help restore Strumica River Basin socio-ecological functions and its overall resilience against complex pressures.

outputs.output_descr: The overall objective of the project is to introduce a set of comprehensive measures to help restore the Strumica River Basin’s socio-ecological functions and increase its overall resilience to pressures resulting from human activities and global changes

The purpose of this project is to expand the knowledge on the water related challenges in the Strumica River Basin and to create an enabling environment for the implementation of a comprehensive set of measures to help restore basin’s socio-ecological functions. Project activities would entail formulation of the necessary planning base, as well as considerable strengthening of capacities necessary for the future basin-scale management of water resources.
An integrated river basin management plan will be developed to support the achievement of the environmental objectives of the current nationa
